name: splitting
description: Microlibrary to split a DOM element's words & chars into elements populated with CSS vars.

scripts.build: rollup splitting.js --output.format umd --name 'Splitting' --output.file index.js && uglifyjs -c -m -o splitting.min.js -- index.js && npm run sizes
scripts.sizes: gzip -9 -c splitting.min.js | wc -c && cat splitting.min.js | wc -c

author: Stephen Shaw (stephen@brokensquare.com)
